metadata.title: CVE-2011-1947 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: fetchmail 5.9.9 through 6.3.19 does not properly limit the wait time after issuing a (1) STARTTLS or (2) STLS request, which allows remote servers to cause a denial of service (application hang) by acknowledging the request but not sending additional packets.

criterions.comment: fetchmail package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.26-1').
